text: Jibun no akugyo o rippadearu to shi, sore o zenji to miru mono (hodo mayotta mono) ga arou ka. Hontoni arra wa, o nozomi no mono o mayowa se, mata o nozomi no mono o michibika reru.Dakara kare-ra no tame ni nageite, anata no mi o sokonatte wa naranai. Arra wa kare-ra no nasu koto o shiri tsukusa reru
